requirements.description: Personal identifiable information can only be passed to Google if it is permitted by Google Analytics policies and terms and the information is hashed using industry standards.
You must have and abide by an appropriate Privacy Policy that complies with all applicable laws, policies, and regulations regarding the collection of information from Users.

type.summary: Compliance with Privacy Laws and Regulations

requirements.description: Your Privacy Policy must disclose Your use of cookies, mobile device identifiers, or similar technology used to collect data.
You must disclose the use of Google Analytics and how it collects and processes data, including by providing a prominent link to Google's privacy policy for partners.

You can use the Service to store and access cookies or other information on Users' devices only if Users are provided with clear and comprehensive information about, and consent to, such storage and access where required by law.

type.summary: User Consent for Data Storage and Access
